name: Hyperliquid
notes: Gitbook documents Hyperliquid REST market data and HyperEVM routing expectations.

name: Project X
notes: No official API docs located; tracking LI.FI launch announcement for integration context.

name: HyperSwap
notes: Documentation covers router contracts, WHYPE token primitives, and pool deployment.

name: Hybra
notes: Only high-level protocol summaries surfaced (e.g., DefiLlama entry); awaiting technical API publication.

name: Upheaval Finance
notes: Governance/audit announcements confirm roadmap, but no public router or SDK references yet.

name: Kittenswap Finance
notes: Docs and repository provide algebra router ABIs and deployment scripts for HyperEVM.

name: Curve Finance
notes: curve-js supports multi-chain pool queries; Router API available for HTTP quoting.

name: Gliquid
notes: Launch posts outline HyperEVM AMM rollout; technical endpoints still private.

name: Drip.Trade
notes: API docs describe quote and analytics endpoints for DRIP pairs.

name: HyperBrick
notes: Gitbook lists pool factories, router addresses, and deployment guides.

name: HX Finance
notes: Product site covers HX launch features; SDK or router docs pending publication.

name: Hypertrade
notes: REST endpoint returns cross-DEX route splits, calldata, and fee data for HyperEVM swaps.

name: 1inch
notes: Classic Swap API v6 exposes /quote and /swap endpoints; API key recommended for production.

name: 0x
notes: Swap API v1 returns executable calldata with gas estimates; API key optional.

name: Odos
notes: Smart Order Router (SOR) API supports POST /sor/quote for route discovery.

name: ParaSwap
notes: Price API delivers best route quotes and calldata; higher throughput available with API key.
